main.name: Martino Kelvin
main.description: I am a Fullstack Developer and currently serving as Minister of the IT Division at KM ITERA, leading digital initiatives and overseeing the development of internal systems and web platforms.
main.bio: studying in Institut Teknologi Sumatera, majoring in Informatics Engineering. Have strong interest in business and technology fields. Very comfortable working with many people also work individually in an environment of change, challenges, multiple deadlines, and priorities.
